column1: #HappyThanksgiving! May your day be blessed by good health great food and much to be thankful for.
The senior citizens of New York could not be reached for comment. https://t.co/C0lZq1tkWi

Congratulations to @RepJimBanks the next chairman of the Republican Study Committee! I look forward to the big ideas you bring to the RSC as you continue to fight for conservative values. https://t.co/UBCJUIHXw0
California Medical Association COVID Guidelines (UPDATED): the virus isn’t spreadable as long as the restaurant costs more than $1000 per person. https://t.co/BlfVA5V3LZ
This again? Really? Anything to satisfy the far left calling the shots I suppose 🤷‍♂️ https://t.co/bFNz5UWARQ
So street parties and protests with strangers are good but Thanksgiving with family is bad? https://t.co/30JUqeNVNJ
This #VeteransDay we honor the brave men and women who have defended our freedoms.  Never Forget.  God bless America and the heroes who protect her🇺🇸 https://t.co/MMadUbaN2f

Thank you Attorney General Barr for following through with my request for investigations. We must get to the bottom of every legitimate allegation of voter fraud that occurred during this election. https://t.co/r4NBOO5Il0
Only 👏 legal 👏 votes 👏 should 👏 be 👏 counted.   The American people are watching.   Read my letters to AG Barr and state election officials below ⬇ https://t.co/37OSpp1yaB
More transparency is the key to increased competition and lower healthcare costs for the American people. Well done President Trump and Secretary Azar! https://t.co/nFzY3Xe8Q1

Our economy continues to recover from the COVID-19 pandemic all thanks to @POTUS’s hard work for the American people! We must continue to get back to work and our normal routines as safely and quickly as possible. https://t.co/cowbJkgItW
The New York Times describing Miles Taylor as a “Senior Administration Official” shows we have every right to question their editorial standards and the credibility of other anonymous “sources.”
The China Phase One deal is working! Thank you President Trump for supporting US farmers and US rice. https://t.co/e6zSuFv45P https://t.co/XrTUhGLIy7

This evening Amy Coney Barrett became the 5th woman in history to serve on the United States Supreme Court. I applaud our Commander in Chief & my colleagues in the Senate for filling the seat with a qualified & fair jurist as our forefathers intended. https://t.co/g8q5NMLHyo

President Trump once again WINNING where past administrations have failed. Today @POTUS brokered a peace agreement between Sudan and Israel- the THIRD major step toward peace in the Middle East in just a few short weeks. https://t.co/92DaOonNtP

While visiting Patton Junction Livestock in Bollinger County I got the chance to speak with folks about monopolizing meat packers & their impact on our meat industry. I’ve been the leading voice of fairness for our meat producers & will continue fighting for them in Congress. https://t.co/ICGNaTn8Ic

We must develop & grow our domestic medical & pharmaceutical supply lines so we are no longer reliant on adversarial foreign governments. We should be in charge of our own critical life saving drugs not China. Today I introduced the Secure America’s Medicine Act to do just that.

Your ideas of how to improve government cut waste and protect our rights are what drives me everyday in Congress. Read more below to see how three recent ideas from Southern Missourians are that much closer to becoming law. https://t.co/mWZzWIbDrd

Our debt emboldens foreign influence and threatens the jobs national security and life quality of future generations. There is a path back to surpluses without the middle class tax increases of the Left let’s get there. https://t.co/Bzj9LB9i9u

President Trump’s tax cuts bill gave new tax relief for every child per family and those credits & cuts should also be available for expecting parents. Today I introduced a bill to allow pregnant families to qualify for the expanded child tax credit from the 2017 tax cuts bill.

Great speaking with John Williams at West Plains Vet Supply about supply chains & our over-reliance on China. The President has worked hard to bring supply chains home & I’ve coauthored legislation to help reduce our dependence on foreign countries. Thanks for having me John! https://t.co/Aq1j2oS3tS
Hats off to this confident and qualified jurist for facing the Senate with nothing but her knowledge honesty and respect for the law. https://t.co/NzzjcKWZ3v

I enjoyed speaking with the @MOFarmBureau about the President’s hard work creating fairer trade for our agriculture industry. I will continue to work closely with President Trump to ensure our rural areas are fought for. https://t.co/GAvIKwX21n

Prince Harry and Megan Markle are using foreign titles to campaign against President Trump and interfere with our election. Today I asked the British Government to put a stop to it.   See my full letter below⬇️ https://t.co/64BdQjYBnG

Pelosi wants more money for state and local government but the nearly $360 BILLION that’s already been appropriated is 16 times more than state’s 2020 revenue loss... Now she wants MORE?! Something doesn’t add up.  https://t.co/m3Pm7EDscl

The attacks from the left are relentless. Our President was sick. We should all regardless of party be praying for his full and healthy recovery. Unfortunately the reaction to the news was disheartening from so many.   More of my thoughts here ⬇️ https://t.co/LSGPe1UNBH

I came to Congress to protect hard earned paychecks & cut government waste. As a member of the Budget and Ways & Means Committee I’ve worked hard doing just that. It’s an honor to be recognized by @GovWaste & an honor to represent the hard working people of Southern Missouri. https://t.co/tVArQ9iAhW

Derek Alms runs Taber Farms a cow/calf facility. While visiting we spoke about my efforts to hold controlling meat packers accountable & to support farmers in opening their own packaging facilities. Our farmers work hard to feed our families I’ll keep working hard for them. https://t.co/v4BGVXiSxd
Welcome home Mr. President! @realDonaldTrump is doing well and returning to the White House this evening. Our President loves this country works tirelessly for it and is a fighter for America.

Pleasure meeting Russ Hoggard of Hoggard Farms. We spoke about the value of infrastructure investment for our rural economy. These investments will help our farmers get their products to market cheaper & faster. It’s important to invest in what will benefit our families & farms. https://t.co/8ELYlI1vm1

Resources found underneath Southern Missouri are essential for everyday life & national security. @POTUS continues to prioritize the protection of Americans & their jobs with executive orders that bring crucial mineral supply chains back to the U.S.   https://t.co/5l4dvu8P0L
My prayers are with the President and First Lady today. I’m confident they will navigate this challenge like the others before putting America first. Get well soon @POTUS!

Your tax dollars should never go to propping up Chinese businesses. That is why @SenRubioPress & I have introduced the Preventing SBA Assistance from Going to China Act to ensure that all small business aid goes to help hardworking American businesses. https://t.co/s0YkXJXq9e

The @China_TaskForce was created to build an action plan against the threat of China. @HouseDemocrats refused a seat at the table and yet many of the @HouseGOP recommendations are bipartisan. We want progress the Left only wants their way. https://t.co/YR2BKWGDON
Click below to read my thoughts on why the Senate MUST fill this seat before November 3rd⬇️  https://t.co/Sa0do0kyjD

Today @POTUS nominated Amy Coney Barrett someone dedicated to upholding the Constitution & spirit of American law for Associate Supreme Court Justice of the U.S. It’s now the Senate’s responsibility to fill this empty seat fulfilling their responsibly to the American people. https://t.co/swaaDyQxjg
They aren’t even trying to hide it. “Biden has also promised to eliminate the Republican tax cuts. This would raise taxes on all income levels.” https://t.co/7pyVCUgbLD
Can you spot the difference in @CNN’s coverage of the Hunter Biden report vs. @realdonaldtrump‘s family? They should be ashamed.  https://t.co/5Bu4yYMOIe
Largest college endowment in the United States cut ‘em off. I think they will be OK without taxpayer funds for a while. https://t.co/zUQ42P44Cb

My Republican colleagues and I put pen to paper and outlined hundreds of policies that would Restore our way of life. Rebuild the greatest economy in history & Renew the American Dream. This is our #CommitmenttoAmerica.  MORE⬇️ https://t.co/pNjPwgNZw9

Today @EPAAWheeler & I spoke with farmers about the importance of regulatory certainty for producers. I’ve worked closely with @POTUS to get the government off the backs of rural America & I’ll keep cutting the red tape created by the Obama-Biden administration. https://t.co/hDWLIYBzBY
Today the United States Air Force is celebrating 73 years of flying fighting and winning. Thank you to all the brave men and women who have served. Happy Birthday @usairforce!

On this day in 1787 the U.S. Constitution was signed by our Founding Fathers. From this document our great nation was born- an example of liberty and democracy for the rest of the world. Happy #ConstitutionDay! https://t.co/zYlhmsHjHt

.@POTUS is committed to regulatory reform & transparency. Speaker Pelosi continues to block similar efforts in the House like my amendment to speed up infrastructure projects for rural America.   READ MORE⬇️ https://t.co/RtZ96T2G5a
.@POTUS showing us the art of the deal with TWO historic agreements that will bring peace to the Middle East. No world leader is more deserving of the @NobelPrize. https://t.co/G8Srqbq5Ee
Restore.Rebuild.Renew! @HouseGOP is ready to deliver for the American people. This is our #CommitmenttoAmerica https://t.co/rqeCnEp4N4

I’m glad to have met the team at Orscheln Farm and Home & hear about how the business has grown. I appreciated learning what issues the store faces & how I can best help. It’s great to see a Missouri-born business become so successful. Thank you Orscheln team for having me! https://t.co/K8BI7wGAbC

On 8/29 Officer Tamarris Bohannon a St. Louis policeman was shot & killed. Officer Bohannon was a husband and father of 3 children. 8 police officers have been shot in St. Louis since June. Mob rule looting assaults & even murder. It ends now.  MORE⬇️https://t.co/75D5IrSk77

Nineteen years ago our country was shaken by tragedy but Americans stood together to overcome terror. Today we remember the thousands of lives lost and the brave first responders who risked their own lives to save others.   May we always honor their memory.  #NeverAgain https://t.co/8GaiPTy8vq

I was glad to meet the Byrd family at their farm in Charleston & discuss the need for fewer regulations so farmers have freedom to grow without the government dictating how they do their jobs. Farmers are already the best stewards of their land their livelihoods depend on it. https://t.co/JnnlCJVeuY

Roger Shaw of Eleven Point Ranch shared with me his concern for fiscal responsibility.  I share Roger’s frustration with how much the government takes & wastes. As a member of the Budget & Ways and Means Committee I’m proud to protect the tax dollars of Southern Missourians. https://t.co/R9DOipFz0G

We have been through a lot this year. With over a million new jobs added in August we have shown we are resilient and determined to get back to work. Allow them to and Americans will always choose work over government handouts.

It’s a great honor to have hosted a quilt which represents the suffragist movement made by the Threads of Friendship Quilt Guild. It honors those who sacrificed to give women the right to vote 100 years ago & is a beautiful reminder of what we as Americans can accomplish. https://t.co/Pjlm4ZlwT7

Great meeting farmer & founder of PumpTrakr Nathan Holmes at his farm in Oran. We spoke about the efficiency his platform creates for irrigation systems. This tech was made by & for the people of Southern MO it’s a pleasure to represent that spirit of innovation in Congress. https://t.co/Jgz50ZFiph

Twidwell Farms raises goats to assist USDA supported research. Enzymes in goat blood are used to develop human cancer treatments.  I’ve supported additional resources for the NIH to help find a cure for cancer I’m glad to see work toward the same goal right here in Southern MO! https://t.co/wkvpR6ZlKR

Every summer I visit farms across Southern MO for a chance to hear firsthand what challenges our farmers are facing & how I can help. These visits are the highlight of the year & provide the ideas I fight for to improve the lives of Missourians.  MORE⬇️https://t.co/jVOAhBozeu

Tamarris Bohannon is the 8th police officer to be shot in St. Louis since June 1st. First responders work tirelessly & selflessly to protect our families. Their sacrifice & bravery deserves our support. We need change now. This criminal violence must end. https://t.co/ao7zQI3JHN

Thank you southern Missouri cattlemen for the chance to speak with you about my efforts to hold monopolizing meat packers accountable & to support cooperation among producers in the name of better prices in the marketplace. It is a pleasure to fight for our cattlemen in Congress.

Today the President of Taiwan announced eased restrictions on American imports of beef & pork. This is GREAT news for Missouri producers. President Trump’s strategy to secure fairer trade deals for American workers & farmers continues to get results! https://t.co/3DuxZVmT7K

Marvin Francis owner of Piney Ridge Ranch spoke with me about recently required digital hunting license systems a challenge for his business without reliable internet.   I will continue fighting to bring broadband to rural Missouri so ranches like Marvin’s remain successful. https://t.co/P9WMBxNAXL

I had a great time touring Chris Kertz’s Sugar Bottom Farm & collection of WWII memorabilia.  Chris and I talked about my continued efforts to work with the President to eliminate burdensome farming regulations & preserve the water rights of farmers. Thanks for having me Chris! https://t.co/xkTuueUWZ0

Thanks to @POTUS’s Phase 1 Agreement with China purchases of American goods have surged. Corn imports in China have risen by 136% pork by 120% & wheat by 325%. By continuing to hold China to their purchase promises our farmers & economy WIN.  MORE⬇️ https://t.co/D7XFfLKOho

Great announcement for connectivity in Cape Girardeau this week. We need more of this in southern Missouri it’s something I have been calling for and even brought the FCC chairman to southern Missouri to see first hand.   Read about it here⬇️ https://t.co/UATxhjiKB7

I offered my election integrity bill as an amendment to Speaker Pelosi’s “postal crisis” legislation. She blocked it from even coming to a vote.  This bill would’ve ensured only eligible voters receive a mail in ballot.  Shouldn’t we all want that??  More⬇️https://t.co/KyH3STEw0F

Great visit with Greg Tharp on his farm in Naylor.   We discussed water infrastructure and drainage issues and working with the Army Corps to get it resolved.   Thanks for showing me around Greg! I’m honored to represent folks like you! https://t.co/KezcixhCsM

Great speaking with @MissouriCorn & southern MO farmers this week. We talked China Phase 1 Agreement and the historic American corn purchase made by China last month. We must continue holding China accountable to the U.S. Ag purchase promises they have made our farmers need it!

It was a pleasure visiting the award winning St. James Winery and Public House Brewing Company.   I enjoyed meeting the hardworking team that keeps these operations running and discussing our shared interest in helping the Southern Missouri tourism industry expand and thrive. https://t.co/pHyiHhpmrf

The Chicken and the Hare Farm and the Hen House Cannery and Goods store owned by Ben & Brandi Boyer are great examples of flourishing small businesses operated with passion.  Thank you for sharing with me the ways I can best support Southern Missouri employers in Congress! https://t.co/KQLbA6oiyo

It will preserve the worth of eligible votes by ensuring mail in ballots aren’t sent to those who have moved passed away or immigrated illegally.   We must protect our voices & votes many have sacrificed to give us the right to use them. https://t.co/KyH3STEw0F

Today I introduced the Integrity of Our Elections Act to safeguard our federal elections.  This bill will prevent mail-in voter fraud from diminishing our democratic process and keep our elections in the hands of law-abiding Americans.  MORE⬇️

The @POTUS brokered Israel-UAE agreement is a major step toward peace in the Middle East.  I’m hopeful more Arab nations will recognize Israel’s rights & normalize relations. It’s a win which will lead to great growth in all countries.  MORE⬇️ https://t.co/GfxhayNFty

100 years ago today the 19th amendment was ratified granting women the right to vote.   Today we remember this historic milestone & celebrate the brave individuals who sacrificed for justice & equality in our democratic process pushing our nation toward a more perfect union.

Thank you Danny and Sandra Miller for inviting me to West Crest Farm.   We discussed how HOS regulations impact businesses like theirs risking animal safety during transport. I’ve coauthored legislation to reform this making livestock hauling safer for hauler and animal alike. https://t.co/OzObnWC0sP

Rance Daniels a rice and soybean producer in Dunklin County invited me to his facility & spoke with me about how access to vital technology impacts the efficiency & profitability of farmers.  Thank you Rance I will continue fighting for reliable internet in rural Missouri. https://t.co/yW1SpDLNcO

Universal Mail-in balloting is an unconstitutional policy which hurts the vote of every lawful American.   It opens our elections to more fraud and corrupt activity than the left has complained about for the last 3 1/2 years.   MORE⬇️  https://t.co/8OZFhyxwF2

.@POTUS helped broker one of the greatest leaps toward peace between Israel & the UAE that we have seen in 26 years.  The prosperity this will bring to the Middle East will benefit the world. I applaud the diplomacy & sacrifice for peace from all parties. https://t.co/97xLzYL6Xv

I had a great time at the Sikeston Jaycee Bootheel Rodeo! Between the exciting rodeo events & impressive community support the event was a great success.  I was glad to speak with Governor Parson & thank our National Guard for their continued service of protecting Americans. https://t.co/htXabGDB9D

I had the chance to see the impressive drive-in theater that farmers David and Karen Whitener built to lift community spirits amid the COVID-19 pandemic.   In Southern Missouri we look out for one another & it is a pleasure to represent the area’s resilient spirit in Congress. https://t.co/v1DIwgCnIL

The American Tractor Museum can’t help but make visitors feel proud to be American.  The museum is filled with tractors dating back to 1911 illuminating the history of machines used to make our district beautiful and prosperous.   Thank you Buchheit family for having me! https://t.co/GMjiDXwvjJ

This weekend I had the opportunity to meet Gary & Melissa Michie at their farm near Advance.   The Michies own Greenfield Turf & supply grass for Arrowhead Stadium.   It was great hearing about their business how I can help and seeing the turf of our WORLD CHAMPION Chiefs. https://t.co/K4kDhOS7ZM

On August 10th 1821 Missouri became the 24th territory to receive American statehood.   It is no wonder that our state is known as the Show Me State Missourians have time and again shown their strength resilience and patriotism.   Happy Birthday Missouri! https://t.co/bDlCY477Va

Patrick Turnage’s family has been growing cotton in the bootheel since 1937!  As I toured his farm we spoke about working with the President to support family owned farms like Turnage with fairer trade agreements and less federal regulations.   Thanks for having me out Patrick! https://t.co/xXKrl6fh3I

Great speaking with Kelly Flowers and Mike Frampton at Flowers Fish Farm.   We discussed the elements that impact their business from predatory birds to accessing manpower.  I appreciate hearing from local employers and the ways I can best fight for their needs in Congress. https://t.co/CvnK0vDiwx

Great morning at Drew’s Acres with Brock and Alyssa Smith.   We discussed our shared concerns about the lack of reliable broadband in the area & how it economically and educationally hurts our farms and families.   I continue to call on our congressional leaders to address this. https://t.co/d6qXi5BLa7

Today we honor the American heroes who received the purple heart while serving in the armed forces. Their courage and sacrifice will never be forgotten and we will forever be grateful for their service to this great nation. #PurpleHeartDay https://t.co/tfs2I124f1
Progressives and their radical policing policies are making American cities less safe.   RT if you agree!  https://t.co/WvgZohDG6r

#OTD in 1956 President Dwight D. Eisenhower signed into law a bill making “In God We Trust” our national motto recognizing the importance of our Judeo-Christian values in American history and throughout our society. https://t.co/ioXxKnYy9t

We should be focused on helping small businesses and American families thrive not returning to the job crushing regulations and big government policies of the Obama-Biden Administration.   A Biden Administration would mean sky-high taxes and no law and order in the U.S.  MORE ⬇️ https://t.co/hF62iJ1xMA
Great to talk to Marc Cox about my new legislation in Congress to ensure there is nothing standing between our service members and their second amendment rights.   LISTEN ⬇️ https://t.co/kY4dmtYeQ4

BREAKING: Democrats can’t help themselves when it comes to spending money and growing the government.    My amendment would have instilled @realDonaldTrump’s desired spending cuts but Democrats voted to return the EPA to the job-crushing ways of the Obama-Biden Administration. https://t.co/eQ8vq6pIhx

Voting on my amendment to ✂️ EPA 💵.   Why do Democrats want to spend billions more than @realDonaldTrump requested?  It’s simple they want to return the agency to the job killing machine it was under Obama-Biden https://t.co/y8hXgeHPwx
The Left believes Americans should spend over a billion dollars to give terrorists free legal advice.  This is perhaps their most radical bill yet.  I voted no.

Speaker Pelosi and the Left want to restrict @realDonaldTrump’s ability to protect our country from foreign nationals that pose a threat to Americans as he did with shutting our borders to China during the coronavirus.   When will they put the American people before politics?

After what happened to the McCloskeys because of an overzealous prosecutor in St. Louis I introduced legislation that federally guarantees American families have the right to defend their home and their private property.  RT if you believe  Congress must pass this bill!

If Speaker Pelosi gets her way we would be defunding law enforcement across this country.   At that point what’s left?   What stands between a parent and someone wanting to come onto their property to do harm to their family?  Congress must pass my bill⬇️https://t.co/Y1GQKiieEm

The Missouri castle doctrine laws clearly support the actions of the McCloskey’s. Gardner’s politically motivated charges are an abuse of power we can’t let stand.  That’s why I’ve introduced legislation to make these rights indisputable and federally protected.
https://t.co/Y1GQKiieEm

We need to send a message to rogue prosecutors that the American people have a right to defend their homes families and property without the fear of political prosecution.   Today I introduced the American Family and Private Property Defense Act to do just that.   MORE ⬇️

Thanks to M&B Land and Cattle in Douglas County for a terrific tour of their operation.  Like them I believe in promoting U.S. beef over foreign imports. That's why I continue to work with President Trump to prioritize the agriculture products made here in America's heartland. https://t.co/AuKKcK16kt

In Missouri you have the absolute right to defend yourself from illegal trespassers. I should know—I wrote the Castle Doctrine laws when I was in the State House.    This is an outrage that threatens the 2nd Amendment rights of all Americans. https://t.co/zBxvbvRLg1

Great to meet with Western Dairy Transport in Cabool to hear about some of the issues they are facing. Rest easy you’ve earned it. https://t.co/LzZzPZkWL7

Are we even surprised at this point?  How much data do you think they’d manipulate to justify more draconian lockdowns?  https://t.co/us08RezVPd

Honored to help deliver food donations this morning in Kennett.  I’m proud of how this community is stepping up and supporting their neighbors struggling during these crazy and uncertain times. https://t.co/gYcZaVzlMC

Even a monument honoring five firefighters who died in the September 11th terrorist attacks is not safe from the Left’s hatred.   Absolutely disgusting. https://t.co/YXsHU6Rn0I

The Supreme Court rightly upheld the Trump Administration’s new rules to protect our religious freedoms from government mandates.  I’m proud to have supported this lawsuit and relieved to see the high court respect the rule of law in its decision. https://t.co/WUOx78WWfu

Honored to join @POTUS at #MountRushmore to celebrate our nation’s independence and greatness! #4thofJuly #IndependenceDay https://t.co/CaLkFbYtTa

Investing in our country’s vital infrastructure has always been a bipartisan venture.  It’s outrageous that Speaker Pelosi would block the full U.S. House from considering an amendment to help speed up these projects while also lowering the cost.  MORE ⬇️ https://t.co/nydJcBNUea

As of today @CBP and @USACEHQ have built 222 miles of new border wall in the United States.   This new system not only enhances our border security but increase the safety of our border patrol agents. https://t.co/ea8VSnaIGj

This week President Trump’s 200th federal judge nominee was confirmed to serve for life.  His commitment to appointing judges who will honor the letter of the law instead of legislating from the bench has helped change the federal judiciary for a generation. https://t.co/rH82wUb8aG

I was honored to help recognize D&L Florists for 30 years of business in Houston.  Small businesses are the lifeblood of our economy.  Thank you to all of our small and family-owned businesses across southern Missouri for your continued service to our rural communities. https://t.co/qvGnLwM5w8

In recent weeks free speech has been under attack from both big tech and also major news outlets.   We must show these companies that they are not too big to be held accountable.   MORE ⬇️ https://t.co/NH9GyxMuCD

Happy 245th Birthday to the @USArmy!  A profound thank you to all of the incredible soldiers who have taken the solemn oath to defend our country our Constitution and our way of life! https://t.co/MBCOLp1R5A

I’m honored to receive the @NTU's “Taxpayers’ Friend Award” for the strongest record in Missouri for supporting limited government economic freedom and low taxes.  You earned your paycheck you should be able to keep it. https://t.co/SJzVHvqJYX

One of my greatest privileges is nominating outstanding students from southern Missouri to attend one of our U.S. service academies.  It’s an intense process and I know these young men will do great things. I look forward to seeing where their military career takes them. https://t.co/7ynuIsFdYZ

Please stay safe with the inclement weather heading our way from Tropical Depression Cristobal.   You can stay informed about the storm with @NWSStLouis.  You can also get the latest safety information from @MoSEMA_.

On the anniversary of D-Day we remember those who courageously fought for liberty. That day marked the beginning of the end of the war in Europe and we owe a great debt to those Americans - The Greatest Generation. https://t.co/frkjQQA3xF

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for having the @TheJusticeDept investigate the recent actions of beef packers.   Ranchers and farmers in southern Missouri have great concerns with the practices of the meat packers.  https://t.co/eoYkMqiWO6
I have seen first hand the relief efforts across southern MO as our area opens up and gets back to work. Proud to live in the great Show-Me State.

This report highlights states slow to get relief funds to rural towns and communities.   Proud to say Missouri is NOT on that list as @GovParsonMO works FOR our rural communities and small towns because that’s where he’s from.  https://t.co/qg4dRiKQJq

Congratulations Ensign Femmer!   I nominated A.J. Femmer of De Soto to attend the U.S. Naval Academy when he graduated from Hillsboro Senior High School.   I know he will achieve great success as he begins his training as a Naval Flight Officer. https://t.co/emQLOmJzbm

It’s good to see Walker Ince offer a salute as he begins his military career following his graduation from the U.S. Air Force Academy.  I was so pleased to nominate him for the academy in 2016 when he graduated from Hartville High School. https://t.co/8t8qnD9xuX
